Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded normal and neoplastic tissue
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VS800-SS automated digital microscope slide scanner
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Olympus VS800 automated digital slide system and HER2 Manual Read application for digital pathology and breast cancer HER2 assessment
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as an aid to pathologists for digital display, detection, counting, and classification of tissues and cells of clinical interest, including semi-quantitative measurement of HER2 in breast cancer tissue immunohistochemically stained for HER2 receptors; as an accessory to Dako HercepTest to assist in assessing breast cancer patients considered for Herceptin (Trastuzumab) therapy.
